messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, I will fight to ensure that an extra £3bn is available for the NHS and to keep healthcare free at the point of use. I will work to make STEM SUBJECTS FREE, maintenance loans for students and scrap inheritance tax. We need to make immigration work for Britain by creating a points based system. Politics needs referendums. I will ensure the ordinary people of Sheffield Hallam are heard.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight to ensure that an extra £3bn is available for the NHS and to keep healthcare free at the point of use.
Make STEM subjects free, maintain loans for students.
Create a points-based immigration system for Britain.
Politics needs referendums. Constituents should be able to recall MPs.

issues.education: Make STEM subjects free, maintain loans for students.
issues.governance: Politics needs referendums. Constituents should be able to recall MPs.
issues.health: Fight to ensure that an extra £3bn is available for the NHS and to keep healthcare free at the point of use.
issues.immigration: Create a points-based immigration system for Britain.
